metadata.title: 2002 OM2002-01 (28 July - 11 Aug 2002): US-Japan Cooperative Survey Data - R/V Oshoro Maru (Cruise ID: OM2002-01)
metadata.description: To continue the long-term acquisition of biological and physical data relating to the summer abundance of walleye pollock (Theragra chalcogramma) larvae and juveniles in the eastern Bering sea shelf region. This is a continuing cooperative research effort between FOCI and the scientists at Hokkaido University of Hakodate, Japan.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To continue the long-term acquisition of biological and physical data relating to the summer abundance of walleye pollock (Theragra chalcogramma) larvae and juveniles in the eastern Bering sea shelf region. This is a continuing cooperative research effort between FOCI and the scientists at Hokkaido University of Hakodate, Japan.
